1.text: I was very vain and didn't want a hearing aid,

4.text: you see them stuck in people's ears or

7.text:
these things hanging over, and I really
didn't want that look.

12.text: But when it got so bad that

15.text: my children didn't want to call me on the phone anymore

18.text: and I couldn't hear when I went out with my friends,

21.text: I decided that I had to swallow my self-pride and just see what they had.

27.text:
I wanted something that could be
camouflaged a little bit

32.text:
so it wasn't so noticeable, but I also
wanted to be able to hear.

36.text:
One thing that I really like about these
hearing aids is that you can't see them.

42.text: Nobody has ever noticed them and that's what I really like about them -

47.text: - one of the things I really like about them.
